data.text: @smashjayy @ThatKevinSmith Okay now I have to re watch it again, that's fine it's been a while. All my favourite shows seem to be on a break right now. Seeing Dark from @ArrowCW in a Star Trek film already freaked me out. Living dangerously lol
@smashjayy @ThatKevinSmith Wow I've seen it dozens of times since the night it came out and I never realized that was her until your tweet #duh

@smashjayy @ThatKevinSmith George Carlin the best and worst moment. I love the fact @ThatKevinSmith has always stayed true to his friends and been there for them when they needed help @JayMewes you two are the standard of true friendship I love you guys. Will always be a fan and we need Jay and lunchbox.

@smashjayy @ThatKevinSmith If I recall from an old interview, for putting most of these people in his earlier movies when they were only medium stars at the time, Kevin cashed in all his favours to get them to come back for this one
@smashjayy @ThatKevinSmith Watched it last week, amazing the star power this movie had.
@smashjayy @ThatKevinSmith 11?!  Who bought that for you?! It was on autoplay and my dad saw it and threw it away...😐
@smashjayy @ThatKevinSmith I just love the name's they had for them. The "hairy bushed nun", and "cock knocker."  WTF? too funny.
@smashjayy @ThatKevinSmith Gotta put my hand in for Chasing Amy.
@smashjayy @ThatKevinSmith Such a great movie, but I still love mallrats.
@stephenwrty @smashjayy @ThatKevinSmith Jersey Girl is one of my favorites.  I hate that Kevin always seems like he's apologizing for it.

@stephenwrty @smashjayy @ThatKevinSmith Personally, I thought Smith directed Carlin to one of his best acting performances in JG. A best-supporting Oscar nod wouldn't have surprised me. Lost George too soon.

@smashjayy @ThatKevinSmith It's a great movie...almost all of Kevin's movies are great if hes your cup of tea..and thankfully I l love his movies.  That and I see the Jersey girl diner about once a week..lol
@smashjayy @ThatKevinSmith Omg I was watching this on amazon prime a few nights ago. You say 11 and I say 23 year old self.  Laughed almost as hard now as I did then.
@smashjayy @ThatKevinSmith Actually watching it now.  I forgot Stifler was in it, among many others.  Fun movie
@smashjayy @ThatKevinSmith You wanna know how? @ThatKevinSmith  is a fucking genius.
